items.content_html: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.
items.title: NicoSnts/Alke: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.

items.content_html: ClipX.js is a lightweight JavaScript library for efficient clipboard management, text manipulation, and user feedback. It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.

It offers simple copy, cut, and paste operations, basic text formatting, and built-in toast notifications with customizable messages, all in a compact package.
